parameters.LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_STOPPED: 0: The local video is in the initial state.

parameters.LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING: 1: The local video capturing device starts successfully. The SDK also reports this state when you call startScreenCaptureByWindow to share a maximized window.

parameters.LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_ENCODING: 2: The first video frame is successfully encoded.

parameters.LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_FAILED: 3: Fails to start the local video.
